lastOpenFiles: Untitled.md
Ultra Hardcore.md
Put engineering teams near the assembly lines.md
Musk had a resistance to regulations. He did not like to play by other people's rules.md
Designing the factory to build a car(product)—The machine that builds the machine—was as important as designing the car(product) itself.md
Design is the fundamental soul of man-made creation that ends up expressing itself in successive outer layers.md
Design is not just about aesthetics; True industrial design must connect the looks of a product to its engineering.md
Focus on engineering and product development.md
Be flexible when something goes wrong.md
Work super hard.md
The only person who would actually agree to be CEO of Tesla was someone who was afraid of nothing, because there was a lot to be afraid for.md
Mission is more important than individual sensitivities.md
Don't be that guy wanting to be everyone's friend.md
You can't manufacture a product without a bill of materials.md
It's not the product that leads to success. Its's the ability to make the product efficiently. It's about building the machine that builds the machine.md
If you invest in a company, you should spend all your time  on the shop floor.md
Every part, every process, and every specification needs to have a name attached.md
A culture based on questioning every rule and assuming that every requirement was dumb until proven otherwise.md
Designing a car is easy. The difficult part is manufacturing it.md
You only get to release your first product once.md
Vertical integration will enable you to control the quality, cost and supply chain of your company.md
Mission is more important  than making profit.md
Create a compelling buzz to transform your product into an object of desire.md
Only the outcome will get rewarded.md
Try new ideas and be willing to blow things up.md
Design, engineering and manufacturing teams should be clustered together.md
